mapper.select: SELECT PRJ.NO FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN (SELECT * FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS WHERE NO IN (SELECT MAX(NO) AS NO FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS GROUP BY REF_PRJ_NO) ) TPP ON TPP.REF_PRJ_NO = PRJ.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM.NO WHERE TPP.STATUS = 'TEMPORARY' AND TM.ID = '${userId}'

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_CONTENT, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, TP.NAME AS TBL_PRODUCT_NAME, TP.PRICE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.MAX_QUANTITY AS TBL_PRODUCT_MAX_QUANTITY, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRODUCT_SIZE, TC.NAME AS TBL_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST TPPL ON PRJ.NO = TPPL.REF_PRJ_NO JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TP.NO = TPPL.REF_PRODUCT_NO JOIN TBL_CATEGORY TC ON TC.NO = PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PRJ.NO = #{projectNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ PRJ (PRJ.NO, PRJ.REGIST_DATE, PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NO.nextval, SYSDATE, ${member.no})
SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NO.currval FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRJ PRJ SET PRJ.TITLE ='${title}', PRJ.START_DATE = '${startDate}', PRJ.END_DATE = '${endDate}', PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT = ${targetAmount}, PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO = ${category.no}, PRJ.CURRENT_AMOUNT = 0, PRJ.VIEWS = 0 WHERE PRJ.NO = ${no}
